attributes.action: share with the public details of unexplained UFO sightings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Whilst I find it hard to believe that aliens are actually visiting earth, and that most, if not all, UFOs have a more down to earth explanation, I think the Government should share any information about UFOs with the general public. Failure to do so only gives rise to wild speculation and even alarm when the rumour mill is in full swing.

Mind you, a perceived threat from extra-terrestrials would certainly have the effect of uniting all the people of the world as never before!
